name: GenerateBlocks
author: Tom Usborne

sections.description:
Add incredible versatility to your editor without bloating it with tons of one-dimensional Gutenberg blocks. With GenerateBlocks, you can learn a handful of blocks deeply and use them to build anything.

GenerateBlocks works hand-in-hand with GeneratePress, but is built to work with any theme.

Looking for more features? Check out GenerateBlocks Pro.

Container

Organize your content into rows and sections. The Container block is the foundation of your content, allowing you to design unique sections for your content.

Grid

Create advanced layouts with flexible grids. The Grid block gives you the ability to create any kind of layout you can imagine.

Headline

Craft text-rich content with advanced typography. Everything from headings to paragraphs – take full control of your text.

Button

Drive conversions with beautiful buttons.

Query Loop

Build a list of posts from any post type using advanced query parameters.

Image

Add static or dynamic images to your content to make a visual statement.

Performance

We take performance seriously. Minimal CSS is generated only for the blocks you need, and our HTML structure is as simple as possible while allowing for maximum flexibility.

Coding standards

Built to the highest coding standards for security, stability and future compatibility.

Fully responsive

Every block comes with tablet and mobile controls, giving you total control of your responsive design.

Documentation

Check out our documentation for more information on the individual blocks and how to use them.
sections.installation:
There’s two ways to install GenerateBlocks.

  1. Go to “Plugins > Add New” in your Dashboard and search for: GenerateBlocks
  2. Download the .zip from WordPress.org, and upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via FTP.

In most cases, #1 will work fine and is way easier.
sections.faq:
How do I add your blocks to my page?

  • Create a new page or post
  • Add a new block, and look for the “GenerateBlocks” category
  • Choose your block and start building.
  • It’s always best to start with a Container block.

What theme should I use?

GenerateBlocks was built to work hand-in-hand with GeneratePress. However, it will work with any theme you choose.

sections.reviews:
The best Gutenberg plugin

By Marco Olmedi (olmostblue) on February 3, 2024

It's simply the best Gutenberg plugin, super light, well integrated and powerfull

Buggy

By yakuzi on December 12, 2023

Impossible to use a full width container if you're using with fse theme. Nice...

There is no order by random feature

By BCD House (bcdhouse) on December 10, 2023

Plugin very bad support, There is no order by random feature

perfect combination with GeneratePress

By 42web on November 8, 2023

GenerateBlocks is the perfect complement to Gutenberg for my projects.

Amazing lightweight quality product from GeneratePress team

By martin24 on September 30, 2023

Super lightweight and works great.

So good! Always using!

By vitsippa on September 15, 2023

Love this and have been using it for years. I use it together with the theme Generatepress, a great and perfect combination/extension. The blocks were a little more beginner-friendly to use before the latest re-build. But when I learn the new flex-controls I understand this is better, leaner, faster and more flexible. The people behind this, developers and support staff are amazing!

One of my 'Go To' plugins for websites

By martinkoss on September 8, 2023

It goes perfectly hand in hand with GeneratePress and has oodles of great features for building well laid out pages, headings, footers, etc. And the support is fantastic.

Simplement parfait

By dimitribasseguy on August 14, 2023

Un plug-in simple et facile d'utilisation, qui fait ce qu'il annonce. Bravo au développeur !

Excellent Plug-in Essential for Block Creation!

By wizardword7 on May 28, 2023

This is an excellent plugin essential for block creation! Recommended!

Excellent plugin for columns and tiled layouts

By Chris Whitford (fcwhitford) on April 28, 2023

The grid block makes it easy to construct a tiled layout or 2 unequal columns to form a sidebar. These are responsive so, for example, if there are 3 tiles across the page, as the width is reduced the layout changes to 2 tiles, then one. Initially setting up the tiles is a bit complicated. One needs to add one tile (container), set all its options (width, padding, border, background, etc) then duplicate it as many times as required. It would be useful to be able to set properties for all the containers in a grid at once. Navigation can get a bit confusing and it's easy to add an extra container unintentionally. One has to keep an eye on the breadcrumbs at the bottom of the edit screen, or switch to the document overview. I haven't used any other blocks in the plugin.

short_description: A small collection of lightweight WordPress blocks that can accomplish nearly anything.
description:
Add incredible versatility to your editor without bloating it with tons of one-dimensional Gutenberg blocks. With GenerateBlocks, you can learn a handful of blocks deeply and use them to build anything.

GenerateBlocks works hand-in-hand with GeneratePress, but is built to work with any theme.

Looking for more features? Check out GenerateBlocks Pro.

Container

Organize your content into rows and sections. The Container block is the foundation of your content, allowing you to design unique sections for your content.

Grid

Create advanced layouts with flexible grids. The Grid block gives you the ability to create any kind of layout you can imagine.

Headline

Craft text-rich content with advanced typography. Everything from headings to paragraphs – take full control of your text.

Button

Drive conversions with beautiful buttons.

Query Loop

Build a list of posts from any post type using advanced query parameters.

Image

Add static or dynamic images to your content to make a visual statement.

Performance

We take performance seriously. Minimal CSS is generated only for the blocks you need, and our HTML structure is as simple as possible while allowing for maximum flexibility.

Coding standards

Built to the highest coding standards for security, stability and future compatibility.

Fully responsive

Every block comes with tablet and mobile controls, giving you total control of your responsive design.

Documentation

Check out our documentation for more information on the individual blocks and how to use them.
